My Work

Check out some of my projects ...

RootsTech Clone, a clone of the major genealogical event in the world including the schedule, speakers with bios and event details. I added a feature not currently available, the attendee can create a schedule of the events they wish to attend.
 Github
Eagle Chiropractic is a site that I have maintained for a friend for the past 10 years. It was built with Dreamweaver and Adobe Photoshop. I did not have agithub account at the time of this project development.
 Built before Github
Limber is a web app clone of the dating app Tinder. It is a group produced project we created to utilize our combined knowledge of PostgreSQL, React, and design using CSS. Other technologies used were Node.js, express-sessions, react-motion-stack, socket.io, react-slick and HTML. Github
